NDP MP on New Defense Minister
New Democrat MP Jack Harris says he will continue to press the newly-minted Defense Minister on matters surrounding search and rescue in the province. Rob Nicholson is taking over from Peter MacKay who has been moved to Justice. Harris says he ...

item.title: Mentioned by VOCM
item.description:
Reaction to Federal Cabinet Shuffle
NDP MP Jack Harris is not at all impressed with today's cabinet shuffle. He calls it a desperate attempt to freshen up a government that is clearly past its best before date. Plenty of change around Stephen Harper's cabinet table doesn't mean much to the MP ...
